title: Predictive Modeling of Learner Engagement in Self-Directed Programming E-Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Programming fundamentals and data analysis experience
context.additional_context: A program where professionals engage in real-time simulations and VR-based learning in a programming e-learning environment using personal devices (BYOD), with formative assessments to diagnose participation

learning_goals: Learners can analyze behavioral data (login frequency, code execution counts, etc.) within e-learning systems in conjunction with subjective engagement survey data
Learners can design a predictive system that classifies learner engagement levels into three tiers (low/medium/high) using an Artificial Neural Network (ANN)-based model
Learners can improve VR simulation learning environments by applying data-driven personalized feedback design principles
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
